About Erin Hollenbank (J.S. Held)

Erin Hollenbank (J.S. Held) provides professional art appraisal services in Cleveland. With expertise in 19th–20th century American art, 19th–20th century European art, Works on paper, they offer reliable valuations for insurance, estate planning, and donations.
